query user(
  $id: String
  $userName: String
  $email: String
  $loginProvider: String
  $providerKey: String
) {
  user(
    id: $id
    userName: $userName
    email: $email
    loginProvider: $loginProvider
    providerKey: $providerKey
  ) {
    id
    isAdministrator
        userName
    email
    storeId
    userName
    userType
    securityStamp
    roles{
      id
      name
      description
      permissions
    }
  }
}

graphql.query:
mutation addOrUpdateCartAddress($command: InputAddOrUpdateCartAddressType!) {
  addOrUpdateCartAddress(command: $command) {
    id
    addresses {
      id
      key
      addressType
      city
      countryCode
      countryName
      email
      firstName
      lastName
      line1
      line2
      middleName
      name
      organization
      phone
      regionId
      regionName
      zip
    }
  }
}

mutation addOrUpdateCartShipment($command:InputAddOrUpdateCartShipmentType!)
{
  addOrUpdateCartShipment(command: $command) {
shipments {
id
shipmentMethodCode
shipmentMethodOption
fulfillmentCenterId
  height
  length
deliveryAddress {
id
key
            city
            countryCode
            countryName
            email
            firstName
            lastName
            middleName
            line1
            line2
            name
            organization
            phone
            regionId
            regionName
            zip
        }
    }
}
}
